mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NM, MEMBER_NO FROM EMPLOYEE JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_GRADE = 'E' AND MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y' AND STORE_NO = #{storeNo}

SELECT SUM(WEEK_SAL) AS PAY_SAL, SUM(WEEKLY_VACATION_PAY) AS PAY_EXTRA FROM (SELECT WEEK, CNT_WEEK_DAY, EMPLOYEE_SAL, TOTAL_TIME, (EMPLOYEE_SAL * TOTAL_TIME) WEEK_SAL, CASE WHEN CNT_WEEK_DAY >=7 AND TOTAL_TIME >= 15 THEN TOTAL_TIME / 5 * EMPLOYEE_SAL ELSE 0 END WEEKLY_VACATION_PAY FROM (SELECT C.*, (SELECT CNT_WEEK_DAY FROM (SELECT WEEK, COUNT(WEEK) CNT_WEEK_DAY FROM (SELECT TO_DATE(#{payStatus} || '-01') + LEVEL - 1 AS DD, SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{payStatus} || '-01') + LEVEL - 1,'D'),2,1,0)) OVER(ORDER BY LEVEL) + 1 WEEK FROM DUAL
CONNECT BY LEVEL <= TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(#{payStatus} || '-01')),'dd')))
GROUP BY WEEK) WHERE C.WEEK = WEEK) CNT_WEEK_DAY FROM (SELECT WEEK, SUM(TOTAL_TIME) TOTAL_TIME, COUNT(WORK_DAY) WORKING_DAY, (SELECT EMPLOYEE_SAL FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE MEMBER_NO=#{memberNo}) EMPLOYEE_SAL FROM (SELECT B.*, (TO_CHAR (WORK_DAY, 'fmiw') - TO_CHAR (TRUNC (WORK_DAY, 'mm') + 1, 'fmiw') + 1) WEEK FROM (SELECT WORK_DAY, SUM(WORK_END - WORK_START) TOTAL_TIME FROM WORK_CALENDAL WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND TO_CHAR(WORK_DAY, 'YYYY-MM') = #{payStatus} GROUP BY WORK_DAY ORDER BY WORK_DAY) B) GROUP BY WEEK) C ))
